snippet.title: Ghost Theory - Kickstarter pitch video (HD)
snippet.description:
Support Us on Kickstarter ► https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/dreadlocks/ghost-theory-a-serious-take-on-paranormal-research
Click Here To Subscribe! ► http://bit.ly/Dreadlocks-Youtube

Ghost Theory is a first-person adventure horror game, designed to be a serious take on ghost hunting and paranormal research. 

In Ghost Theory, you will be equipped with authentic ghost hunting tools and you will travel around the world to investigate the real most haunted places on Earth. 

Using stealth and your wits to survive you will collect data and evidence to help your team of scientists to upgrade your equipment. And ultimately to solve the eternal mystery of the afterlife.

Social Links:
Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/dreadlocks/ghost-theory-a-serious-take-on-paranormal-research
Official Website: http://www.ghost-theory.com
Steam Greenlight: http://bit.ly/GhostTheoryGreenlight
Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/DreadlocksEN
Twitter: http://twitter.com/DreadlocksEN
YouTube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/DreadlocksLtd
ModDB/IndieDB Page: http://www.indiedb.com/games/ghost-theory
